text: vyaktamaya telivukalum keant mump yusuph ninnalute atutt varikayuntayittunt‌. appeal addeham ninnalkk keantuvannatine parri ninnal sansayattilayikkeanetayirunnu. ennitt addeham maranappettappeal iddehattinu sesam allahu ini oru dutaneyum niyeagikkukaye illa enn ninnal parannu. aprakaram atikramakariyum sansayaluvumayittullatarea avare allahu valiterrikkunnu
